summary: THE BACKUP CAMERA SYSTEM DOES NOT COME ON WHEN THE CAR IS SHIFTED INTO REVERSE OR WHEN THE CAR IS MOVING IN REVERSE CREATING A SAFETY HAZARD AND BREACHING COMPLIANCE RULE FMVSS 111 (SPECIFICALLY SECTION 5.5.6 OF FMVSS, WHICH PERTAINS TO REAR VISIBILITY). THERE IS A MASSIVE RECALL ALREADY IN PLACE FOR MODEL YEARS 2018 THROUGH 2020 BUT IN LIGHT OF THIS ISSUE EXISTING IN ROLLS ROYCE WRAITH 2016 MODELS, IT IS CLEAR THAT EARLIER MODEL YEARS SHOULD BE INCLUDED IN THE MASSIVE RECALL.  *TR

THE BACKUP CAMERA SYSTEM DOES NOT COME ON WHEN THE CAR IS SHIFTED INTO REVERSE OR WHEN THE CAR IS MOVING IN REVERSE CREATING A SAFETY HAZARD AND BREACHING COMPLIANCE RULE FMVSS 111 (SPECIFICALLY SECTION 5.5.6 OF FMVSS, WHICH PERTAINS TO REAR VISIBILITY). THERE IS AN ACTIVE MASSIVE RECALL ALREADY INITIATED FOR MODEL YEARS 2018 THROUGH 2020 BUT IN LIGHT OF THE SAME EXACT ISSUE EXISTING IN MY 2016 ROLLS-ROYCE WRAITH, I ASK THAT YOU CONSIDER EXPANDING THE RECALL TO INCLUDE 2016 ROLLS-ROYCE WRAITH MODELS AS THE SAFETY HAZARD IS PRESENT AS WELL. SMALL CHILDREN COULD BE HIT WHILE GOING IN REVERSE IF THE REARVIEW BACKUP CAMERA IS MALFUNCTIONING.
